$interpreted: Cara: ...*crying*...,Headmaster~
Betty: Headmaster, all the Panthers are so barbaric~
Annie: Headmaster, they beat us up for no reason!
Charle: Good to see that you're all safe. About your violation of the rules, we'll have a long~ chat about it once we get back to the Academy.
Charle: For a long time, due to the Academy's lack of understanding about the Panthers' cultural rules, our actions have caused you a lot of trouble.

Charle: I hope we can have a proper conversation today and get to know each other better. 

Please inform me of your situation so that the Academy gives you an appropriate compensation.
Charle: Fatima, what do you think?
Fatima: Hmph, if you say so, of course I...
Jerus: If that's the case, then how about you pay us money as compensation!
Charle: Money?
Jerus: The Academy's research has damaged Whistlewood Valley's ecosystem and made it harder for us to find prey.
Jerus: You pay us some money so we can buy some food from other humans to keep ourselves alive. Pretty reasonable demand, right?
Panther Resident: That kind of makes sense.
Panther Warrior: That way, our lives will be much easier.
Panther Hunter: We won't have to work hard and hunt for food anymore.

Fatima: What are you guys thinking? Are you going to tell me that Panthers' dignity is something that can be exchanged for money? 
The culture and lifestyle that has been passed down by our ancestors, are you going to sacrifice all that for mere profits?
Fatima: Let me tell you. The one thing we want is for the Rune Academy to leave Whistlewood Valley and promise to never return!
Panther Resident: She has a point. Life may be hard, but I want to live with dignity.
Panther Hunter: If we take their money, doesn't that mean that we have to listen to their orders...
Charle: Apologies, if your condition is for Rune Academy to leave Whistlewood Valley, there's simply no way I can accept that...

Panther Warrior: What, so you refuse to leave?
Then we should apprehend all of them!
Panther Hunter: Let's just kill them all!
Charle: Apologies, I have to prioritize the safety of my students. I promise that I will return here myself again once everybody calms down.
Charle: I am sorry.
Fatima: ... Wretched human!
Fatima: Jerus, what exactly were you trying to do back there!?

Jerus: I oughta be asking you! We Panthers have been isolating ourselves from the outside world for way too long! 
If this keeps up, our lives in the future will only get tougher and tougher.
Jerus: I just want to negotiate a better term for everybody. What's wrong with that?

Fatima: You can use whatever method you want.
But if you want to sacrifice our dignity and our ancestors' culture, the answer will always be NO!

Jerus: Forget about it. It's no use talking to you.
I'm leaving!
Fatima: ...Are my ideals really too ancient? Is Jerus's approach the right one for this day and age?
Fatima: This noise!?
Fatima: What is going on here!?
Jerus: ... I was doing my night patrol when I discovered that she was using Rune magic here!
Jerus: She said she was going...*cough*...going...to cause harm to the Panthers.
Jerus: I was going to stop her, but then she tried to kill me to shut me up...

Tica: What the hell are you talking about? You're the one who attacked me first! That's why I hit you back.
I was only following Headmaster Ceres...
Tica: Crap, headmaster said that this operation needed to be kept a secret...
Fatima: Another one of Charle's shady schemes? Damnit, I'll teach you a lesson!
Tica: ... Hmph!
Tica: ...Umm, did I screw up...Headmaster told me to not cause trouble...run now, think later~
Fatima: This darn trick again!
Fatima: Jerus, are you alright?
Jerus: ...*cough*... Fatima, I'm sorry, you were right...I was too naive. The Rune Academy had no intention to negotiate at all.
Jerus: They'd rather completely wipe out the Panthers to gain full control of Whistlewood Valley...
Fatima: No need to worry. You go get some rest. I promise that I'll get revenge for what they did to you!
Fatima: I promise.

... Hmph!

I promise.
